name: Madrid to Barcelona: OUIGO’s Incredible 320km/h train for 9 EURO!
description:
Get Surfshark VPN at http://surfshark.deals/winginit - Enter promo code WINGINIT for 83% off and THREE MONTHS for free!

Check out my Europe by Train Bright Trip guide: https://www.brighttrip.com/europebytrain
Wow! Ouigo's super cheap, high speed train between Madrid and Barcelona is perhaps Western Europe's best value train trip. Skipping city centre to city centre in under 3 hours, come with me as I try this budget high speed rail option in the XL seats. I can't think of a more fun way to cross Spain...can you? Food menu: https://qrcgcustomers.s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/account8579625/15707646_1.pdf?0.12207438837180207

This year I'll be taking more of the world's finest and most spectacular trains. VIA Rail's four-day epic "The Canadian", the Hiram Bingham up to Macchu Picchu in Peru, the glorious El Chepe in Mexico, Amtrak's Southwest Chief and even the iconic Blue Train will all come to your screens in 2022. 

Merch store: https://teespring.com/stores/wingin-it-3

Follow me on Twitter: @paul_winginit ¦ https://twitter.com/paul_winginit

Follow me on Instagram: paul_winginit ¦ https://www.instagram.com/paul_winginit

My website: www.winginit.me
